optics Module¶

A clustering algorithm from Mihael Ankerst, Markus M. Breunig, Hans-Peter Kriegel, Jörg Sander (1999). “OPTICS: Ordering Points To Identify the Clustering Structure”. ACM SIGMOD international conference on Management of data. ACM Press. pp. 49–60.

class optics.PriorityQueue[source]¶

Bases: object

A priority queue inspired by http://docs.python.org/2/library/heapq.html

add(item, priority=0)[source]¶

Add a new item or update the priority of an existing item

get()[source]¶

Get last entry or None

pop()[source]¶

Remove and return the lowest priority item. Raise KeyError if empty.

remove(item)[source]¶

Mark an existing item as REMOVED. Raise KeyError if not found.

optics.core_dist(p, N, M, points)[source]¶

Return the list of the distance to the M nearest points
